mobile\/index.md.Jeedom est utilisable sur Mobile de deux: Jeedom can be used on Mobile in two ways
mobile\/index.md.Jeedom adopte une version spécifique sur: Jeedom adopts a specific version on mobile and tablet
mobile\/index.md.Vous y accédez à partir de la même adres: You access it from the same address, in a mobile browser (Firefox, Chrome, Safari, etc
mobile\/index.md.Cette version adaptée est aussi simplifi: This adapted version is also simplified, for the sake of display and performance
mobile\/index.md.Vous pouvez également afficher la Synthè: You can also view the Summary
mobile\/index.md.L'affichage d'un Design est plein écran,: The display of a Design is full screen, click with three fingers to return to the home page
mobile\/index.md.Affichage des tuiles de vos scénarios, p: Display of the tiles of your scenarios, by groups, with the possibility of activating/deactivating them, stopping/starting them
mobile\/index.md.En cliquant sur le titre du scénario, vo: By clicking on the title of the scenario, you will access its log
mobile\/index.md.Accédez à la Timeline, aux Logs, Analyse: Access Timeline, Logs, Equipment Analysis, Crons, Demons and Health
mobile\/index.md.Basculez entre les thèmes principal et a: Switch between main and alternate themes, go to desktop version, force update, go to documentation, about, or log out
mobile\/index.md.Certains plugins peuvent avoir un affich: Some plugins may have a display dedicated to the WebApp
mobile\/index.md.La page d'accueil de la WebApp peu-être: The WebApp home page can be set on your Jeedom in Settings → Preferences
mobile\/index.md.La WebApp a un rôle principalement consu: The WebApp has a mainly advisory role
mobile\/index.md.Vous pouvez bien sûr interagir avec vos: You can of course interact with your equipment as in Desktop, but you will not be able, for example, to edit a scenario, modify equipment, access the Jeedom configuration
mobile\/index.md.L'application mobile Jeedom (compatible: The Jeedom mobile application (IOS / Android compatible) allows you to control your Jeedom home automation system, whether in local Wifi, or on your operator's 3G / 4G network
mobile\/index.md.L'application se connecte automatiquemen: The application automatically connects to your Jeedom via a QRcode, no configuration is necessary
mobile\/index.md.Vous retrouverez sur votre mobile les fo: You will find on your mobile the functionalities of your Jeedom
mobile\/index.md.scénarios, objets connectés et domotique: scenarios, connected and home automation objects, plugins
mobile\/index.md.Vous pourrez aussi personnaliser votre a: You can also customize your application with shortcuts and more
